HTML.title: Introduction to HTML
HTML.description: Learn the basics of HTML and its role in web development.

HTML.title: HTML Document Structure
HTML.description: Explore the structure of an HTML document, including the DOCTYPE declaration and basic layout.

HTML.title: HTML Elements and Tags
HTML.description: Understand HTML elements, tags, and their significance in creating web content.

HTML.title: HTML Headings and Paragraphs
HTML.description: Learn how to use HTML headings and paragraphs to structure your content.

HTML.title: HTML Links and Anchors
HTML.description: Discover how to create links and anchors to connect web pages and resources.

HTML.title: HTML Lists (Ordered and Unordered)
HTML.description: Explore the use of ordered and unordered lists in HTML for better organization.

HTML.title: HTML Images
HTML.description: Learn how to embed images in your HTML documents for visual appeal.

HTML.title: HTML Forms and Input Elements
HTML.description: Understand the creation of HTML forms and various input elements for user interaction.

HTML.title: HTML Tables
HTML.description: Discover how to create tables in HTML to present data in a structured format.

HTML.title: HTML Semantic Elements
HTML.description: Explore semantic elements in HTML and their role in improving document structure.

HTML.title: HTML Multimedia (Audio and Video)
HTML.description: Learn how to embed audio and video content in HTML documents.

HTML.title: HTML Styles and CSS
HTML.description: Understand the use of styles and CSS in HTML to enhance visual presentation.

HTML.title: HTML Comments
HTML.description: Explore the use of HTML comments to add notes and explanations in your code.

HTML.title: HTML Entities and Special Characters
HTML.description: Learn how to represent special characters and entities in HTML.

HTML.title: HTML Validation and Best Practices
HTML.description: Understand HTML validation and best practices for creating robust web documents.

HTML.title: Responsive Web Design with HTML
HTML.description: Explore responsive web design principles and techniques using HTML.

HTML.title: HTML Metadata (Meta Tags)
HTML.description: Learn how to use metadata and meta tags to provide additional information about your HTML document.

HTML.title: HTML Layouts (Divs and Spans)
HTML.description: Discover how to create layouts using divs and spans in HTML for better organization.

HTML.title: HTML Inline and Block Elements
HTML.description: Understand the difference between inline and block-level elements in HTML and their use cases.

HTML.title: HTML Deprecated Elements
HTML.description: Learn about deprecated HTML elements and their alternatives in modern web development.

CSS.title: Introduction to CSS
CSS.description: Learn the basics of Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) and its role in styling web documents.

CSS.title: CSS Selectors
CSS.description: Explore CSS selectors and how they are used to target HTML elements for styling.

CSS.title: CSS Box Model
CSS.description: Understand the CSS box model, including margin, padding, border, and content.

CSS.title: CSS Typography
CSS.description: Learn how to style text, fonts, and typography using CSS properties.

CSS.title: CSS Colors and Backgrounds
CSS.description: Explore CSS properties for defining colors and backgrounds in web pages.

CSS.title: CSS Layouts
CSS.description: Understand different CSS layout techniques, including Flexbox and Grid.

CSS.title: CSS Transitions and Animations
CSS.description: Learn how to create smooth transitions and animations using CSS.

CSS.title: Responsive Web Design with CSS
CSS.description: Explore CSS techniques for creating responsive web designs that adapt to various screen sizes.

CSS.title: CSS Media Queries
CSS.description: Understand how to use CSS media queries to apply styles based on different devices and screen resolutions.

CSS.title: CSS Flexbox
CSS.description: Learn the CSS Flexbox layout model for building flexible and efficient web layouts.

CSS.title: CSS Grid
CSS.description: Explore the CSS Grid layout system for creating two-dimensional layouts with rows and columns.

CSS.title: CSS Positioning
CSS.description: Understand CSS positioning properties to control the placement of elements on a webpage.

CSS.title: CSS Transformations
CSS.description: Learn how to use CSS transformations to modify the appearance of elements, such as rotation and scaling.

CSS.title: CSS Variables
CSS.description: Explore the use of CSS variables to create reusable and maintainable styles in your projects.

CSS.title: CSS Pseudo-classes and Pseudo-elements
CSS.description: Understand CSS pseudo-classes and pseudo-elements for styling specific states or parts of an element.

CSS.title: CSS Flexibility and Responsiveness
CSS.description: Learn advanced CSS techniques for creating flexible and responsive web designs.

CSS.title: CSS Best Practices
CSS.description: Understand best practices and tips for writing clean, efficient, and maintainable CSS code.
